attributes.action: Get Boris to formally close all pubs, making insurance companies liable to pay
attributes.additional_details: The government need to do this as pubs are the hub of many communities and employment especially in rural areas.
attributes.background: Pubs are now struggling due to Boris telling the public to stay away rather than telling pubs to close due to the coronavirus meaning many pubs will not survive.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that pubs, clubs and restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus  

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
